Text: Financial Advisor disclaimerI just wanted to follow up on my voice mail John Peyton referred me to you regarding a financial advisor disclaimer We would like to provide drilling and EP companies a summary of FAS and its potential effects on their companies Such information may effect Johns efforts to develop a forward dayrate market in the Gulf of Mexico as he is marketing options that will ideally hedge the counterpartys dayrate exposure I understand we should provide a cover letter with any such documentation specifically stating we are not acting in a financial advisory role and that you have a template or such verbiage we can use Can you please provide me with this I would greatly appreciate your help Thank you kate ext
